Hah! Free trade is BS. It's not what you think, there are two 
american companies sueing the Canadian gouvernment for loss of 
business, under the NAFTA agreement, for billions of dollars, Free 
Trade isn't helping, it's screwing everything over, and making the 
rich richer, and the poor poorer, and FAST. You are woefully 
uninformed...
